title: Tote Bag Paint Night
desc: Ever wanted to make your own custom tote bag? Come hang out with Design at UCI and unleash your creative side for a social night of tote bag painting! - Limited supply

title: History of Graphic Design
desc: Did you know that the iconic Nike Swoosh was made by a student for only $35? How did this happen, and how did that impact the world of design? Join us in SSL228 on Monday 5/8 at 8pm to learn about the history of graphic design with famous designers and their work in our workshop!

title: Design Tinder
desc: Want to get to know your fellow designers and maybe love too? Join Design at UCI to participate in our first design themed dating roulette to enter and win prizes! We will have an interest form down below for members to sign up if you want to participate. Admission is $3. We hope to see you there!

title: Beyond Design: Navigating Cross-Functional Collaboration
desc: Ever wonder what it's like to work with UX researchers, developers, and project managers? As designers, we must collaborate cross-functionally to translate our designs from ideation to creation with various goals and constraints in mind. Come join us on Zoom to hear product designer Minjun Chen from Spotify share her experience and advice on working in cross-functional teams!

title: Design <> Developer Handoff
desc: Welcome back, designers! Get pumped for our first general meeting of spring quarter, where we‚Äôll be talking about cross-functional collaboration between designers and developers with Commit the Change :purple_heart: Learn about best practices during design handoff, including creating design systems, design documentation, and utilizing helpful handoff tools!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: Come out to Project Teams Demo Day and see what your fellow designers have been creating the last 8 weeks! Project Teams is a quarterly program that provides students with design experience in a collaborative setting. Project Teams Demo Day is open to all general Design at UCI members and a great chance for teams to showcase their designs, research, and takeaways from the program!

title: Intro to Adobe Illustrator
desc: Have you always wanted to learn how to make your own graphics? If so, come join our Adobe Illustrator Workshop in ALP 1700 on 2/21 at 8pm! Participants will also have the chance to join on Zoom. This event will specifically be for beginners, and we‚Äôll be going over some of the application‚Äôs basic tools. Please make sure to have Adobe Illustrator downloaded on your computer before the event! The Adobe Creative Suite is free to all UCI students. The link to instructions on how to download the application will be in our bio!

title: Intro to Logo Design with UCSB Creative Lab
desc: Are you interested in designing iconic and memorable logos like Apple, Nike, and many other brands? Check out our Intro to Logo Design workshop in collaboration with UCSB Creative Lab. You‚Äôll learn about different types of logo, the design process, tips, and practice with hands-on exercises in our workshop!

title: Nailing Design Interviews: The Gaming Industry
desc: It's recruitment season, everyone! Hear all the tips and tricks from Anya Li @ Riot Games to hear about her experience as a designer in the gaming industry. Learn what you need to do to get your next dream design job!üëÄüôåüíØ

title: Pajama Movie Night
desc: Cozy up in your pajamas and join Design at UCI for a movie night, where we‚Äôll be playing a movie (exact movie TBA)! Pizza and snacks will be provided.

title: Product Design & Ideation
desc: Interested in learning more about product design? Join our beginner-friendly workshop as we discuss UI/UX design, ideation and evaluation, and the product development process. We'll also be taking a closer look at the design tool Figma and going through a quick idea generation/design thinking exercise!

title: Advanced topics in Figma with Product@UCI
desc: Interested in UI/UX design and want to learn how to creat cool projects and product design in Figma? Come join our workshop in collaboration with Product Association on Tuesday 11/8 in DBH 1600 at 8pm. We will cover some features and resources in Figma. There will also be fun follow-along design activity!Interested in UI/UX design and want to learn how to creat cool projects and product design in Figma? Come join our workshop in collaboration with Product Association on Tuesday 11/8 in DBH 1600 at 8pm. We will cover some features and resources in Figma. There will also be fun follow-along design activity!

title: Developing your Personal Brand w/ Rachel Kim
desc: Ever wondered what a personal brand means? Stuck on how to improve your portfolio or just need some inspiration? DAUCI is hosting a speaker event presenting Rachel Kim, who has worked with Lucid Software, TOMS Shoes, and Mattel. Come hear our featured art director speak about branding and a design that is personal to YOU!

title: Pumpkin Patch @ Tanaka Farms
desc: Hey fellow DE-SIGN-ERS, come relax before or destress after your midterms with Design @ UCI at Tanaka Farms Pumpkin Patch! Please fill out the interest form since their will be a limited number of spots available. Come with us to solve corn mazes, frolic across the pumpkins patches and look at cute farm animals!

title: Design‚Ä¶at UCI and Beyond!
desc: Hello designers!! Join us for a special event about design at UCI and beyond held over Zoom hosted by our very own exec team. Learn about the resources and opportunities here at UCI to further your design skills, including organizations, classes, and jobs. Explore what post-grad paths look like for designers who graduate out of UCI including industry, research, and grad school. We also might be inviting a special guest, so stay tuned!!

title: DaUCI x WiCS: Intro to UI/UX
desc: Are you interested in learning more about UI/UX? Join our beginner-friendly workshop in collaboration with WiCS on Monday, 10/17 in DBH 6011 at 6:30pm! We'll be discussing both UI and UX design in great detail, including visual design fundamentals, evaluating for good UI, the UX design process, and applying design principles to your code. We'll also be taking a closer look at Figma, a design tool used in industry. Remember to RSVP (link in bio) if you plan on attending!

title: AMA (Ask Me Anything) Summer Internship Panel
desc: Hey designers! Design at UCI is holding a summer internship Ask Me Anything panel with our very own board in DBH 1600! Come and connect with our very own board members who will be detailing what their summer internship experience was like. Learn more about how you can land your next SWE, product, and/or UX/UI design internships

title: Game Night
desc: Hey fellow anteaters, come out to Design at UCI official Game Night where we will be hosting tournaments of your favorite games like Smash, UNO, and Codenames! Come to compete in the various games and collect tickets along the way to win some cool prizes. Game Night is a great place to meet new people, play board games and relax before classes start to ramp up. Admission is $3, see you there

title: Introductory Workshop
desc: Welcome back, anteaters üçÅ Join us in DBH 1600 for our first event of the year to meet the board, learn more about the events and programs for fall quarter, and get a brief introduction to design!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: Interested in learning about working cross-functionally as a designer? Join us for a workshop in collaboration with UCSD Design Co (@ucsddesignco), where we‚Äôll be discussing what collaboration in industry looks like within design teams, as well as cross-functionally with engineers, PMs, and research teams.

title: Cross-Functional Design
desc: Interested in learning about working cross-functionally as a designer? Join us for a workshop in collaboration with UCSD Design Co (@ucsddesignco), where we‚Äôll be discussing what collaboration in industry looks like within design teams, as well as cross-functionally with engineers, PMs, and research teams.

title: Picnic in Aldrich
desc: Join us for a picnic in the middle of Aldrich where we'll host games, icebreakers, and food!

title: 2022 Spring Night Market
desc: Come support Design at UCI at the 2022 Spring Night Market on May 11th! We‚Äôll be selling egg tarts at 1 for $3, 2 for $4, and our rainbow heart pen tool sticker for $3. We‚Äôll be at booth #59, next to Langston Library from 5 to 9 PM ‚Äî join us for club festivities, fundraising fun, and good vibes

title: Mock Whiteboard Challenge
desc: Interested in practicing your design thinking skills? Unsure about how to tackle a whiteboard challenge during a design interview? We will be hosting a Mock Whiteboard Challenge event, in which participants will be paired with a design expert to complete a virtual whiteboard challenge on Figma! Note that due to high demand, spots are limited so keep an eye out for signups when they open!

title: Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel
desc: Curious about designing at the industry level? Not sure how to land internships? Swing by our Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel to ask student peers about their design internship experiences! From graphic to UI/UX to product, we‚Äôll have panelists from all types of design backgrounds. Be sure to prep any burning questions you may have, and we hope to see you there!

title: Game Night Extravaganza
desc: Join Design at UCI for an ultimate game night extravaganza! We‚Äôll be hosting a smash tournament as well as other board and card games to compete and play in! There will be a $3 admission fee & prizes!

title: Food And Fun At UTC
desc: Join us for boba and pizza at UTC! We‚Äôll eat pizza, have boba, play games, and get a chance to get to know other members of the club!

title: ICS Clubs Fair
desc: Come check out Design at UCI at the ICS Clubs Fair on Thursday (3/31) from 12-2pm! We‚Äôll be having flyers, freebies, and fun so make sure to stop by and say hi!

title: Presenting Your Designs
desc: Welcome back from spring break, designers! Join us for our first in-person workshop of the year to learn how to effectively present your designs! Excited to see you all there! :)

title: Design Social: Design at UCI x SB Creative Lab
desc: Hey designers! Nervous about the upcoming designathon? Come meet other designers (potential team members!) from both UCI and UCSB at our social. We'll be creating cute little trading cards on Figma so we can all get to know each other better. It'll be a fun and chill event so make sure to come through!

title: Components and Prototyping
desc: Welcome back, designers! Hope everyone had a festive holiday season. We‚Äôre starting off winter quarter by exploring how components and prototyping are used within Figma and the overall design process. Join us for a hands-on workshop that focuses on how components can increase workflow efficiency and how Figma facilitates the building of complex prototypes!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: See what Project Teams has been up to this quarter! Each group will get the chance to present and share their hard work.

title: Autumn Night Market
desc: Visit our booth during the UCI Autumn Night Market event. We will be selling stickers and food to fundraise. See you there!

title: Smash Tournament
desc: We will be hosting a Super Smash Bros Tournament Week 8 Monday. The top three winners will be awarded a prize, as well as a shoutout on Design at UCI's social media. Entrance fees are $3 per person.

title: Portfolio Tips and Review with Industry Professionals
desc: Portfolios are a super important way to showcase your design skills and differentiate yourself whether you're in UI/UX or graphic design. If you‚Äôre looking for tips on how to present your portfolio and potentially even get them reviewed by professionals in the industry, come sign up for our event!! People will be randomly selected to get their portfolios reviewed from the sign-ups (which are due November 2 11:59 p.m.) and contacted with instructions on what to prepare.

title: Fireside Chat with Professor Arpita
desc: Looking to learn more about UX in academia? Come to our second industry event of the year where Dr. Arpita, one of our very own Informatics professors here at UC Irvine, will discuss her career in academia along with her studies of designing for health and human behavior change. If you‚Äôre interested, come join our fireside chat with Dr. Arpita!

title: User Research 101
desc: Nearly all of today‚Äôs products, designs, and applications revolve around the one same thing: users. Learn about typical research methods at our workshop to find out how you can better understand users!

title: Social Media Marketing
desc: Why do so many organizations focus on social media marketing? How can good design techniques increase the effectiveness of marketing via social media? If these topics interest you, join us at our Social Media Marketing workshop, an event in collaboration with Marketing Association!

title: Visual Design Workshop
desc: What makes a design aesthetically pleasing? Why do certain color combinations look good together? Find the answers to these questions and more at our Visual Design workshop!

title: Speaker Panel: Explore Careers in Design
desc: Looking to learn more about design? Come to our first industry event of the year and learn from a panel of designers currently working in the field! Each speaker will give valuable insight into their career and experience in the industry. If you‚Äôre interested in the fields of product design, UX design, visual design, or graphic design, join us this Friday!

title: Introductory Workshop
desc: Get a chance to meet the Design at UCI board. See what workshops we'll be hosting this quarter and learn about the best ways you can take advatage of the resoureces we have to offer. Also get a brief introduction to design.

title: Project Teams Presentations
desc: It's almost the end of Spring Quarter! You know what that means... Project Teams Presentations! The theme was open-ended so participants were allowed to go creative with their projects. Attend the meeting this Friday to see what our teams have made!

title: Game Night Social
desc: This week we will be having a game night social. Come hang out with peers and board as we play some virtual games together. This event will take place on Discord at 6PM so join our server by this Friday! Let's have some fun!

title: Social Media Marketing
desc: Are you a board member of a campus organization that‚Äôs struggling with marketing? Join Design at UCI‚Äôs crash course on marketing specifically for student organizations! We‚Äôll be going over some basic aspects of branding such as logo, flyer, and web design that you can utilize to attract more attention on campus. As a design based organization, we‚Äôll also be sharing some of our own marketing tips and tricks that have been effective for our club!

title: Happy Hour Social
desc: This week, we will have a happy hour to chill after classes, bond with one another, and relax with your favorite drink (non-alcoholic drinks for anyone underage ofc ;). We will also have a live tutorial on how to make a Mojito ü•¥. The event will be hosted over Discord at 6pm, so let's meet, make drinks, and chat with videos on! We can always switch to playing games or wherever the night leads.

title: Something in Common
desc: Get to know your fellow designers better! We‚Äôll put participants into groups and they'll work together to find something in common in several different rounds. More limitations will be added each round to increase difficulty.

title: How to Conduct User Interviews
desc: UX designers utilize user interviews early in the design process to understand the audience they are designing for. How do you organize a user interview? We'll be going over the basics in this workshop so you'll be ready to conduct user interviews for your own projects! We will also be hosting an after-event social, 'Something in Common', so stick around to the end and get to know each other!

title: Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel
desc: Join us for an "ask-me-anything" panel from fellow UCI students on how they've landed design internships and roles! We'll be discussing personal tips from our own job application processes, so come prepared with questions or just come chat for a chill time!

title: Persuasive Design with Marketing Association
desc: Join us for this exciting collab workshop with Marketing Association as we explore persuasive design: design principles based on human behavior and psychology! How do these principles influence decision-making, and how can both designers and marketers use this knowledge to their advantage to create better user experiences and increased conversions? Don‚Äôt miss out on this special cross-subject deep dive into the effects of persuasive design in guiding users towards marketing goals!

title: The Basics of UX Recruiting
desc: Portfolios? Resumes? What's a whiteboard challenge? Are you interested in applying for UI/UX roles, but don't know what to expect? We'll be going over the different kinds of UX jobs, tips on the job application process, and how to position yourself for a design role no matter your major.

title: Introduction to UX with Jane Chang
desc: Jane is a Product Design Lead at Google in Irvine/Seattle. Before Google, she worked for Walt Disney, Universal Pictures, Toyota/Lexus, Apple, Volkswagen AG and led product design in the cybersecurity space. She started her career in the agency world at Saatchi & Saatchi and RPA, and led design at TBWA/Chiat/Day. She studied Graphic Design at NYU and received her Master's in Visual Communication from Johns Hopkins University. Jane currently lives in Irvine with her husband and 6-year-old son.

title: How to Nail your UX Interview with Chris Ota
desc: Originally from Hawaii, Chris Ota started off designing and building websites after graduating community college 13 years ago. He packed his bags in 2015 and moved to San Francisco with no job lined up, looking for a new chapter in his life. Starting from the bottom as a product designer, Chris has been at Lyft for about 3.5 years now, focused on patient transportation to and from their appointments. Besides his day to day, he helps with interviewing full time and intern candidates, does design mentorship at work, and is an active mentor with ADPList.
